author: Agency Report
title: Nigerian Businessman Mohammad Algoni Celebrates Author Ndifreke Ukpong's Remarkable Literary Achievement | Independent Newspaper Nigeria
text: Nigerian Businessman Mohammad Algoni Celebrates Author Ndifreke Ukpong‚Äôs Remarkable Literary Achievement Renowned Businessman Mohammed Algoni, also known as Mohammed A Terab, extended warm congratulations to Ndifreke Ukpong for achieving the remarkable feat of authoring 26 books at the age of 26. The heartfelt commendation took place during Algoni‚Äôs visit to Ukpong on January 7, 2024, in Port Harcourt. Born on August 15, 1999, Mohammed Algoni has been actively involved in various sectors, and his support for emerging talents in different fields is well-recognized. In a gesture of appreciation for Ndifreke Ukpong‚Äôs literary accomplishment, Algoni commended the author for his dedication and hard work in achieving such an impressive milestone at a young age. During the visit, Algoni shared words of encouragement with aspiring authors, emphasizing the importance of perseverance in the face of challenges. He urged budding writers never to give up on their dreams, regardless of the obstacles they may encounter on their literary journey. Ndifreke Ukpong, the talented author in question, expressed gratitude for Algoni‚Äôs visit and encouragement. The meeting between the businessman and the author not only highlighted the literary achievement but also underscored the significance of mentorship and support within the creative community.

author: Escrito por: Daniel Rivera Guzm√°n
title: VIDEO: J√≥venes navegan calles inundadas en colonia de Tamaulipas tras paso de "Alberto"; ¬°Como en Venecia!
text:
Luego de que la tormenta tropical ‚ÄúAlberto‚Äù se abri√≥ paso para ingresar con fuertes vientos y precipitaciones en territorio mexicano durante la madrugada del jueves 20 de junio en Ciudad Madero , Tamaulipas , posteriormente, el meteoro provoc√≥ lluvias puntuales torrenciales en zonas del norte y noreste del pa√≠s, siendo el estado de Nuevo Le√≥n y Coahuila los m√°s afectados ante la crecida y desbordamiento de algunos r√≠os; sin embargo, los estragos tambi√©n se hicieron sentir al sur de la entidad tamaulipeca.
Al mal tiempo, buena cara Las regiones de Tampico , Altamira y Ciudad Madero , fueron las m√°s afectadas por las lluvias, ocasionando encharcamientos severos en varios sectores. En esta √∫ltima localidad, en la colonia hip√≥dromo, un par de j√≥venes decidi√≥ verle el lado positivo a las inundaciones y emprendieron un ‚Äòviaje‚Äô por su barrio a bordo de una lancha.
Como si se tratara de una de las trajineras de Xochimilco en la Ciudad de M√©xico o un viaje en g√≥ndolas de Venecia , los amigos se abrieron paso entre la corriente y recorrieron varias calles aleda√±as. En las im√°genes se puede observar c√≥mo los j√≥venes sonr√≠en mientras realizan el ‚Äòviaje‚Äô en medio de las lluvias y rel√°mpagos, al tiempo en el que narran d√≥nde se ubican y por qu√© lo hicieron.
El video r√°pidamente se volvi√≥ en tendencia y est√° muy cerca de llegar a las 100 mil vistas, los usuarios recibieron con buenos ojos esta ‚Äòaventura‚Äô y realizaron varios comentarios positivos.
@elrolassg Mi momento mas humilde en mi colonia ü§£ü§£ #hipodromo #ciudadmadero #tampico ‚ô¨ sonido original - EL ROLASS Las lluvias seguir√°n afectando a varias regiones en el Golfo de M√©xico Tras las inundaciones y v√≠ctimas mortales que dej√≥ la tormenta tropical ‚ÄòAlberto‚Äô en su recorrido hacia el norte del pa√≠s, las autoridades meteorol√≥gicas advierten sobre la formaci√≥n de un nuevo cicl√≥n tropical.
El Servicio Meteorol√≥gico Nacional (SMN) ha emitido una alerta por la presencia de un canal de baja presi√≥n en el noreste de M√©xico y la entrada de humedad proveniente del Golfo de M√©xico. Esto provocar√° lluvias torrenciales en zonas de Puebla y Veracruz , as√≠ como intensas precipitaciones en el noreste del pa√≠s.
El nuevo sistema tiene un movimiento diferente y se encuentra mucho m√°s cerca de las costas de Campeche. Se espera que se aproxime a√∫n m√°s a la regi√≥n, concentrando la humedad en Veracruz y Tamaulipas .
Estados ¬°No te pierdas nuestro contenido, sigue a Fuerza Informativa Azteca en Google News! Publicado: 23/06/2024 | üïë 17:04 Notas Estados Escrito por: Daniel Rivera Guzm√°n Compartir Tweet

author: Vivek Narayanan
title: Kerala to receive heavy downpour as low-pressure formation from Kerala to Gujarat coasts | Kerala News - News9live
text: Thiruvananthapuram: The Indian Meteorological department has predicted heavy rains and strong winds gusting at a speed of 50kmph in Kerala for the next three days with heavy down expected in northern districts of Kannur, Kozhikode, Wayanad and Kasaragod. The Kerala Disaster Management Authority (KSDMA) has advised tourists and locals not to venture near the river beds as water levels in most rivers are rising due to the rainfall. A yellow alert is been issued in all the 4 districts of Malabar region. The IMD has also cautioned fisherman not to venture into the sea due to the presence of high tides and strong water currents. As per the weatherman, a low pressure is developed from the Kerala coasts up to the Gujarat coasts Meanwhile on the rescue and search operations, nine more bodies were recovered from Mundakkai and Pothukallu region. The army is focusing the operations in the landslide regions of Mundakkai and Choora Mala whereas local police, fire force, coast guard and the local rescuers including scuba divers are engaged in the search operations in Chaliyar and Iruvazhinji river in Kozhikode district. The search operations is divided into 6 zones where there are 10 teams where each team member consists of 30 members of the army. Rescue teams at Punchiri Mattom area are meticulously engaged in removing soil using earth moving machinery to recover the bodies. Search operations and instructions will continue on Friday, Saturday and Sunday with the help of Cadaver dogs. Meanwhile, there are nearly 9000 people staying in the various relief camps in the district. As per the health department 146 people have been identified till now in the various hospitals in Wayanad. As per the latest data, 302 people have died and 206 people are found to be missing in the landslides that caused unimaginable disaster in Wayanad.

author: - Burger King Spokesperson
title: VIDEO: Mom finds side of weed in kid's meal
text:
VIDEO: Mom finds side of weed in kid's meal
Updated | By The Drive with Rob and Roz
Most kids want some junk food, not a joint.
We all know fast food isn‚Äôt the healthiest choice ‚Äì but it‚Äôs tasty, a fun treat, and, let‚Äôs be honest, sometimes just the most convenient option.
VIDEO: South Africans not impressed by Brits comments on SA
What you don't ever expect, however, is for your fast food to come with a side of danger.
Mom Janna Michelle Baker was stunned when she picked up chicken fries from Burger King for her 11-year-old daughter, only to find something unexpected in the order.
VIDEO: New South African spin on a chicken nugget
Upon closer inspection, she discovered alongside the chicken fries was an unwelcome extra: "a side of Mary Jane".
Watch the video here:
[@jannamichelle6]Cannot make this up üò≥ !!! I didn‚Äôt ask for a side of this @Burger King.[#ohio][#sideorder][#tiktokmademebuyit][‚ô¨ original sound - JannaBama]
While Baker joked about Burger King suddenly selling broccoli, she was not impressed to find marijuana in her daughter's meal.
LOOK: Optical illusion picture leaves people confused
She reached out to the drive-thru, and the manager on duty assured her that the general manager would be in touch first thing the following morning.
Since Baker shared the video, Burger King has issued an official statement to WTAE news.
We contacted the Franchisee of this restaurant immediately upon learning of this incident and can confirm that the employee in question has been terminated. We were very disappointed to learn of the incident and do not take incidents that put our guests in danger lightly.- Burger King spokesperson
While it is legal to possess weed if you're 21 or older in Ohio, it hasn't been fully decriminalised yet.
There's no doubt that accidentally finding yourself in possession of drugs can be terrifying and stressful.
Tune in to 'The Drive with Rob & Roz', on weekdays from 16:00 ‚Äì 19:00. Stream the show live here or download our mobile app here.

- 94.2

author: @alltop
title: Russia dramatically underreporting deaths from warship attack - Alltop Viral
text: Russia dramatically underreporting deaths from warship attackPosted by [Annie May](https://alltop.com/viral/author/annie-may)/ December 28, 2023 Russia is dramatically [downplaying the number of people killed](https://ca.news.yahoo.com/russia-drastically-underplaying-toll-warship-165324562.html) in a [recent warship attack](https://www.businessinsider.com/russia-confirms-ukraine-took-out-novocherkassk-warship-black-sea-crimea-2023-12). [Alexey Navalny has been missing for more than two weeks](https://www.cnn.com/2023/12/22/europe/navalny-disappearance-putin-election-intl-hnk/index.html). [Putin quietly hints that he is open to a ceasefire with Ukraine](https://www.nytimes.com/2023/12/23/world/europe/putin-russia-ukraine-war-cease-fire.html). [Russia stole nearly 8 million tons of Ukrainian harvest](https://euromaidanpress.com/2023/12/23/russia-stole-nearly-8-million-tons-of-harvest-in-occupied-ukraine/). [Russia is preparing a major offensive as the ground freezes](https://euromaidanpress.com/2023/12/20/russia-preparing-major-offensive-in-avdiivka-as-ground-freezes-warns-white-house/). [Russian drones are allegedly dropping tear](https://www.businessinsider.com/ukrainian-troops-say-russian-drones-are-dropping-tear-gas-choking-starting-fires-2023-12) gas on Ukrainian troops on the front lines. President Zelenksy has [denied that Ukraine is losing its war against Russia](https://www.bbc.com/news/live/world-67760177?src_origin=BBCS_BBC). [Putin tells Russia that his aims with the war are unchanged](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-67711802). [Putin has admitted that Russia has suffered tremendous losses in Ukraine](https://www.newsweek.com/putin-admits-russia-suffered-huge-losses-ukraine-1852660). [The US is going to issue another round of funding to Ukraine](https://www.defense.gov/News/Releases/Release/Article/3615582/biden-administration-announces-new-security-assistance-for-ukraine/). Earlier this week, more than [100 European countries encouraged the United States](https://www.pravda.com.ua/eng/news/2023/12/11/7432632/) to offer more funding to Ukraine. [Zelensky is set to travel to Washington again](https://www.kyivpost.com/post/25285). The [White House has said the cost of not supporting Ukraine is too high](https://kyivindependent.com/white-house-costs-of-not-supporting-ukraine-too-high-to-pay/). [Aid to Ukraine has fallen](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-12-07/new-aid-to-ukraine-drops-to-lowest-level-since-war-began?leadSource=reddit_wall) to its lowest level since the war began. The [White House has warned of an urgent need to send more aid to Ukraine.](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-67585902) [Russian soldiers executed two surrendering Ukrainian soldiers](https://www.kyivpost.com/post/24977). [Russians‚Äô support of the war is falling dramatically](https://www.euronews.com/2023/12/02/russians-support-of-ukraine-war-collapses-finds-poll), according to a recent poll. [Russia is paying off military wives to stave off criticism](https://inews.co.uk/news/world/russia-paying-off-soldiers-wives-silence-anti-war-dissent-2788669) before the next election. [Putin is pushing Russian women to have as many as 8 kids](https://www.businessinsider.com/ukraine-war-putin-urges-russians-8-kids-amid-demographic-crisis-2023-11). [Russia suffered its worst losses of the war so far](https://www.semafor.com/article/11/29/2023/ukraine-russia-war-updates-russia-suffers-worst-month-for-casualties-uk-says) this November. [Audio intercepted from Russia troops fighting in Ukraine](https://apnews.com/article/ukraine-war-russian-soldiers-intercepted-audio-d2418788051731a32689feb821cd29ec?user_email=a72137fca6de941f924bfd282515a6cd53e072240494d19ed4a1c9b8a677ff62&utm_term=Afternoon+Wire) suggest they‚Äôre getting tired of the war. [Ukraine has regained more ground](https://english.nv.ua/nation/russians-have-nothing-similar-to-surovikin-line-on-left-bank-50371231.html) in Kherson Oblast. [Ukraine is claiming to have pushed Russian forces back as far as five miles,](https://www.businessinsider.com/ukraine-pushed-russian-forces-back-2-5-miles-from-dnipro-river-banks-2023-11) which would be the first meaningful success of the counteroffensive. Zelensky has warned [Ukrainians to be prepared for intensified Russian](https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-tells-ukrainians-prepare-russian-winter-onslaught-2023-11-12/) attacks this winter. [Ukraine has enough energy resources](https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-has-enough-energy-resources-get-through-winter-energy-minister-2023-11-12/) to make it through the winter. [Ukraine has destroyed a major Russian warship](https://www.kyivpost.com/post/23747). Ukraine has warned that, without more help from allies, it is entering a [war of attrition with Russia](https://www.cnn.com/2023/11/03/world/ukraine-president-warns-long-attritional-war/index.html). [Russia has attacked the largest number of settlements](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-67283305) in one day since the beginning of the war. [Russian soldiers have been accused of killing a family of nine](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-67262610) people for refusing to give up their house. [Russia‚Äôs new assault on Ukraine is causing heavy casualties](https://www.euronews.com/2023/10/27/war-in-ukraine-russia-suffering-significant-losses-in-new-offensive-white-house-says), according to the U.S. [Russia has begun a massive assault across the eastern front](https://kyivindependent.com/russia-intensifies-attacks-along-much-of-eastern-front/). There is [fierce fighting in eastern Ukraine as Russia](https://www.cnn.com/2023/10/13/europe/russia-attack-avdiivka-ukraine-intl/index.html) steps up its assaults. [Russia launched a large attack in eastern Ukraine](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-67095103). Putin has claimed that [Russia successfully tested a nuclear-powered cruise missile](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-67021695), which would have a potentially unlimited range. There is no proof that his claims are true. A [Russian airstrike has killed 51 people at a Ukraine funeral](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-67022615). [Russia is trying to get back on the UN human rights council.](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-66919358) In the latest (and most disturbing) Russian propaganda ad, [Russian soldiers say they hope to live in conquered Ukraine cities](https://www.yahoo.com/news/russian-soldiers-dream-conquering-ukrainian-032433973.html). Taiwan is complaining [China is harassing them by flying 103 planes](https://apnews.com/article/taiwan-china-flights-b8a78493341bd3af15f4fd58be692e4d) towards the island‚Äôs airspace. The [United States will give Taiwan $345 million in military](https://apnews.com/article/taiwan-military-aid-china-support-06e61a0e0ed787ea120f839ef59885fa) aid. [Taiwan is using Ukraine as a model as they prepare for possible Chinese aggression](https://www.theguardian.com/world/2023/jul/09/ukrainian-strategy-has-become-a-model-taiwanese-beef-up-military-to-face-china-threat). [China has simulated an attack on key Taiwanese targets](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-65223970) China‚Äôs foreign minister has [warned the United States not to cross its ‚Äúred line‚Äù](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2022/12/23/us-must-stop-unilateral-bullying-chinas-foreign-minister-says) with ‚Äúbullying‚Äù tactics. China claims it drove off a [US naval cruiser near the Spratly](https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-says-it-drove-away-us-cruiser-that-illegally-intruded-waters-near-south-2022-11-29/) Islands. [China has warned of a potential arms race](https://globalnews.ca/news/9238670/china-arms-race-b52-bombers-australia/) after learning that the US was sending [nuclear-capable bombers to Australia](https://www.wsj.com/articles/u-s-plans-to-send-b-52-bombers-to-australia-in-effort-to-counter-china-11667268615). President Biden has said that the [United States would defend Taiwan if China invaded](https://www.dw.com/en/biden-us-forces-would-defend-taiwan-if-china-invades/a-63166248). [China has been simulating attacking United States](https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-says-china-has-been-simulating-attacks-us-navy-ships-2022-09-01) ships, according to Taiwan. Taiwan [shot down a Chinese drone](https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-shoots-down-unidentified-drone-kinmen-2022-09-01/); yesterday, [Taiwan fired on a Chinese drone](https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-restraint-does-not-mean-it-wont-counter-china-2022-08-30/) that invaded its airspace.More than [50 Chinese warplanes and 6 warships](https://focustaiwan.tw/cross-strait/202208180020) have been spotted near Taiwan. [Chinese aircraft have entered Taiwanese](https://www.aninews.in/news/world/asia/17-chinese-military-aircraft-5-ships-cross-taiwan-strait-median-line20220817113038/) airspace yet again. Just two weeks ago, Taiwan scrambled jets as 22 [Chinese aircraft invade Taiwanese airspace](https://www.reuters.com/world/china/taiwan-scrambles-jets-22-chinese-fighters-cross-taiwan-strait-median-line-2022-08-03/). [Australia‚Äôs defense minister has said that China‚Äôs military buildup is the ‚Äúmost ambitious‚Äù since WWII](https://www.newsweek.com/china-military-buildup-most-ambitious-since-wwii-australia-warns-marles-lloyd-austin-1714923) and could endanger geopolitical stability. [China has launched an AI-piloted, unmanned naval ship capable of carrying and launching dozens of drones](https://www.businessinsider.com/china-launches-worlds-first-ai-unmanned-drone-aircraft-carrier-2022-6). [Taiwan has deployed advanced, fourth generation fighter jets in a show of force](https://thehill.com/policy/international/asia-pacific/582095-taiwan-deploys-advanced-fighter-jets-amid-tensions-with) to stand up to China. China has fifth-generation fighter jets, but so does the United States, who has backing Taiwan. [The president of Taiwan has said that the threat from China is increasing every day](https://www.cnn.com/2021/10/27/asia/tsai-ingwen-taiwan-china-interview-intl-hnk/index.html), and she has confirmed that there are US military trainers assisting the Taiwanese. Last week, [Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed to achieve a ‚Äúpeaceful reunification‚Äù with Taiwan](https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-xi-says-reunification-with-taiwan-must-will-be-realised-2021-10-09/), despite the threatening presence of Chinese fighters in Taiwanese airspace over the past months. In response, the [Taiwanese president has vowed to defend Taiwan‚Äôs sovereignty](https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-pledge-defence-sovereignty-democracy-2021-10-09/). [Biden has sided with China as tensions heat up between China and Taiwan, reiterating that the U.S. will abide by the ‚Äúone China‚Äù policy](https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/biden-says-he-chinas-xi-have-agreed-abide-by-taiwan-agreement-2021-10-05/)‚Äì‚Äìmeaning the US will follow the Chinese assertion that Taiwan is its territory. [Taiwan has recorded a record number of Chinese jets in its airspace](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-58794094). This past summer, Chinese jets entered Taiwanese airspace multiple times. In June, [China sent a massive force of 28 aircraft into Taiwanese airspace, including nuclear-capable bombers,](https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-largest-incursion-yet-by-chinese-air-force-2021-06-15/) the largest and most threatening show of force yet. [The Chinese government, angered by recent developments between the U.S. and Taiwan, has warned the U.S. State Department to ‚Äústop all forms‚Äù of official outreach to Taiwan](https://www.tampafp.com/china-warns-state-department-to-stop-all-forms-of-official-outreach-to-taiwan/). This might actually signal a warming of tensions, consider a few months ago [China was threatening to fly fighter jets over Taiwan if U.S.-Taiwan relations continued to warm](https://www.newsweek.com/china-fighter-jets-will-fly-over-taiwan-declare-sovereignty-state-media-says-1583109). China also threatened ‚Äúall-out war‚Äù if Taiwan fires on the jets.
